name: prog.1 (itch)
description:
prog.1 is a 2D puzzle platformer designed around a core mechanic: you play an anthropomorphic computer virus that infects virtually everything it touches, pun intended.

Parallel to gameplay, you audibly follow the storyline of Dr. Cushing and Dr. Keiko, the scientists assigned to the G.Ai.A project; an attempt to create an artificial, digital universe.

prog.1 is not for the easily defeated. Every level is meticulously designed to leave the player with strong emotions known to produce vocal patterns usually unsafe for the workplace and/or small children. While these levels may often challenge your thumb dexterity, they also will challenge your mind while discovering the most efficient method of traversing each map.
